content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 16), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(3,3)近傍と推定。現位置(28,16)からは航続22では届かないため、空母は安全を保ちつつ北西へ2ヘクス移動して今後の索敵圏を拡大。初動はBSQ1のみを北西高緯度コース(10,4)へ発艦し、往路での視認を狙う。BSQ2は温存し、次ターン以降で北西～西側の別扇区へ投入して重複を避ける。敵の索敵半径に入らないよう当面はx<24かつ過度な北上を避けつつ接近する方針。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":26,"y":14},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":4}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=4 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=11 y=5.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"訂正：発艦目標が航続22外だったため修正。敵は(3,3)近傍想定。初動は空母をNWへ離隔を保ちつつ前進、BSQ1を有効範囲ギリギリの(11,5)へ索敵発艦。BSQ2は温存し次ターンに別扇区へ展開して重複を避ける。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":26,"y":14},"launch_target":{"x":11,"y":5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (11, 5) while at (26, 14).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 15), en route to target (26, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (26, 14), outbound toward (11, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(3,3)近傍想定。索敵優先で扇状に展開する。BSQ1は(11,5)方面、BSQ2はやや西寄り(14,8)へ発艦してカバーを拡大。空母はNWへ間合いを詰めつつも中央群島を避けて接近、次ターン以降さらに西北へ調整。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":24,"y":14},"launch_target":{"x":14,"y":8}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (14, 8) while at (24, 14).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 15), en route to target (24, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (23, 12), outbound toward (11, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (24, 14), outbound toward (14, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"索敵扇形を維持しつつ空母はNWへ前進。ただし敵推定初期位置(3,3)からの半径22外に留まり安全距離を確保。BSQ1(→11,5)・BSQ2(→14,8)は同航で索敵継続。空母は本ターンは(23,14)へとどめ、次ターン以降の状況で更に西進を判断。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":23,"y":14},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 14), en route to target (23, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 11), outbound toward (11, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (21, 12), outbound toward (14, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"索敵継続。BSQ1は(11,5)方面、BSQ2は(14,8)方面で北西扇形をカバー中。空母は中央群島を避けつつやや西へ前進し、次の打撃射程を確保。発艦中のため追加発艦なし。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":21,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 15), en route to target (21, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 8), outbound toward (11, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 11), outbound toward (14, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"索敵扇形を維持。BSQ1(→11,5)・BSQ2(→14,8)で北西方面を広くカバー中。敵は(3,3)近傍想定。空母は被発見リスクを抑えつつ西へ機動して次波の射程を伸ばす。次ターン、BSQの報告に応じて更に北西へ寄せ、未探索扇区へ再発艦予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":19,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 11) while at (14, 6).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 11) while at (14, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (14, 11) (previously at (12, 9)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 15), en route to target (19, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 6), outbound toward (11, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 9), outbound toward (14, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機ASQ2を(14,11)で確認。進行ベクトル(12,9)→(14,11)からSE方向へ索敵/攻撃航路と推定。敵空母はその逆方向(NW)に位置する可能性大。こちらのBC1(19,15)はこのままだと迎撃/索敵に引っかかる恐れがあるため、予測ルートから外れるよう南東へ離脱して距離を取る。BSQ1/BSQ2は目標到達後に帰還予定、帰還航路上で敵機の復路方向を観測し、次波の索敵扇区をNW深部(例: 8,4〜10,6帯)に設定する計画。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":21,"y":16},"launch_target":null}}

Turn 7 of 30.

- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (17, 12) while at (14, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (14, 8).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (17, 12) (previously at (12, 9)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 5), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 8), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機ASQ2は(12,9)→(17,12)とSEへ進出。敵空母はその逆方向(NW)にある公算大。こちらは未着艦で再発艦不可のため、被索敵・被攻撃回避を優先して進路をASQ2の予測進路から外す。BC1を南東へ離脱し、BSQ1/2の着艦後にNW深部（例: 8,4 と 6,6 近傍）の扇状索敵を再開する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":23,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"ASQ2を(20,16)で視認。これまでの軌跡(12,9→17,12→20,16)からSEへ索敵/攻撃の往路中と推定。敵空母はNW側にある可能性が高い。こちらは着艦待ちで再発艦不可のため、まずは被攻撃リスクを下げる回避を優先し、進路をSEへ外して間合いを取る。BSQ1/2は帰還継続。着艦後は敵機の復路方位を手掛かりにNW深部へ扇状索敵を実施予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":25,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"ASQ2が(23,18)まで接近、こちら(24,18)が往路で捕捉された公算大。直撃回避を最優先し、空母はSEへ退避して攻撃軌道から外す。BSQ1/2は着艦まで帰還継続。復路での敵機の退方向を観測し、敵空母のNW推定位置を絞り込んだ後、着艦次第にNW深部へ扇状索敵を再開する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":26,"y":20},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"ASQ2に接触・迎撃。敵機はSE→こちら攻撃→NWへ復路と推定、敵空母はNW（概ね(9,6)〜(12,8)帯）にいる蓋然性大。迅速な再発艦のためBC1をNWへ寄せ、BSQ1/2の着艦を前倒しして即時の扇状索敵→打撃へ移行する。次ターンは(11,6〜7)と(9,6〜8,5)帯に振り分けて索敵予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":22,"y":16},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"ASQ2は(23,18)→(21,18)→(19,18)と西へ復路。敵空母はその逆方向＝西～北西方面にある可能性が高い。こちらは早期発見を最優先しつつリスク低減のため空母は予定通りNWへ寄せて回収・再発艦態勢へ。BSQ2を敵機復路線上（y=18帯）へ発艦し、西方での敵空母捕捉を狙う。BSQ1は回収後、次ターンにさらに北西深部へ扇状索敵予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":22,"y":16},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":18}}}
